text: Vinnie & Bobby is an American television sitcom that aired on Fox from May 30 to July 11, 1992. The series is a spin-off of the 1991 sitcom Top of the Heap, which was itself a spin-off of Married... with Children. Series star Matt LeBlanc played the character of Vinnie Verducci on all three shows, as did Joey Lauren Adams as Mona Mullins, although she only appeared in the backdoor pilot of the Married... with Children episode. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 American television series debuts Category:1992 American television series endings Category:FOX network series
title: Vinnie & Bobby
